name: eSkin - Minecraft Skins Guide
description:
Skins for Minecraft Tutorials and Guide brings you tutorials showing you how to create your own skins for Minecraft.

- Create Minecraft Skins
- Build your own skins by accessing popular Minecraft Skin creator websites within the app
- Access the world's most popular skins
- Tutorials give quick overview on how to create skins on each website
- Open skin creator websites in your browser
- Download skins to your computer
- Record notes within the app

This guide is unofficial and is not associated with or endorsed by Mojang AB. This application is for educational purposes only and does not include the Minecraft Game in the app, Minecraft must be downloaded separately. Internet connection required to download mod and forge. All items, names, places and other aspects of the game described in this application are trademarked and owned by their respective owners. We make no claim to and do not have any rights to the foregoing.
